
{{alias}}( idx, max )
    Restricts an index to a range from `0` and to a specified maximum value.

    Parameters
    ----------
    idx: integer
        Index to clamp.

    max: integer
        Maximum index value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: integer
        Clamped index.

    Examples
    --------
    > var idx = {{alias}}( 2, 10 )
    2
    > idx = {{alias}}( -5, 10 )
    0
    > idx = {{alias}}( 15, 10 )
    10

    See Also
    --------
